message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,300,000. It's a valuable asset that I'm confident you'll find very useful.  Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $1,150,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,150,000 is simply too low for me to consider.  I'm willing to come down to $1,250,000.  This reflects the true value of the product and is a fair compromise. Let's work together to make this deal happen.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $1,225,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that reflects its value while staying within my budget. I look forward to your response.
